game.title: The Bandit's Stash
game.objective: Find and retrieve the bandit's hidden stash.
game.description: The notorious Redbeard gang has been terrorizing travelers on this road. They have a secret hideout, where they keep their valuables. You must find it and bring back the stolen goods to the village elder.
game.quest-giver: Village Elder (located near the town square)

task.objective: Speak with old Gerald, who lives in the nearby forest. He might have some useful information about the hideout location.
task.description: You can find Gerald near the old oak tree, just north of the village.

task.objective: Search for clues at the Redbeard's Camp.
task.description: Redbeard's camp is located in a clearing near the bandit-infested ruins. Be cautious as there may be guards on duty.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the Redbeard's Hideout.
task.description: The hideout entrance is located behind a waterfall in a secluded cave. Look for clues around the camp to find out how to access it.

task.objective: Retrieve the hidden stash and return it to the village elder.
task.description: The Redbeard's Hideout is well-guarded, so proceed with caution. Once you have secured the stolen goods, return to the village elder to complete your quest.
task.location: Village Elder (located near the town square)
